ModMetaData.name: Alpha Props - Ship Parts
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson

li.displayName: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decoration

ModMetaData.description:
Adds 66 new space ship props for Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decorations. These are non-functional and for decorative purposes only. They can be used with Save Our Ship 2 or just placed in the colony to spice up vanilla space ships.
<size=24>Credits</size>
The authors of Save Our Ship 2, Thain and Kentington, for originally inspiring the pieces in this mod.
<size=24>Issues</size>
No issues known at the moment
<size=24>Plans for the future</size>
Oh you can bet I will add new things!
<size=24>Changelog</size>
Full changelog on GitHub
